reasoning: Arnold-Chiari Malformation type III (rare form with occipital encephalocele). Total ACM incidence ~4-8 per 100k, type III represents ~5-10% of cases. Estimated incidence 0.3-0.5 per 100k based on neurological case series and birth defect registries. Often diagnosed prenatally or in infancy.
source: Neurosurgical literature and birth defect surveillance
